pathA: Take the well-trodden path: If Alex chooses this path, they follow the footsteps of those who came before, embarking on a journey marked by familiarity and convention.
pathB: Take the less traveled path: If Alex chooses this path, they venture into the unknown, stepping off the beaten track to forge their own destiny.
consquenceA: Taking the well-trodden path may lead to encounters with friendly travelers or established settlements but could also result in missed opportunities for discovery.
consequenceB: Taking the less traveled path may present greater challenges and dangers but could also lead to unique encounters, hidden treasures, and unexpected allies.
